reviewText:
This training program, Is very understandable.  I think It will appeal to both the beginner as well as those who have used Movie editing programs before.  Pinnacle can be hard to understand in some areas, but this program explains all areas very well.
David Santeford

P.S. I purchased this product from Amazon.

Paul Holtz  will guide you through Pinnacle 11 & 12 with such ease you will feel that you are an editing pro in such a short time.  Paul offers a teaching techinque that skips all the fluff and gets directly to the heart of video editing.  I can't say enough about this tutorial.

Gene Lowery
Paramus, New Jersey

I found this to be a good basic tutorial.  It will give you the tools needed to get started using Studio.  I was looking for something a bit more advanced and in depth, so it wasn't very helpful to me.  I did learn a few tips and tricks, so I'm giving it 3 stars.
